1: {"invocation": "Display the current CPU usage for all processes.\n", "cmd": "top"}
2: {"invocation": "List the top 10 memory-consuming processes.\n", "cmd": "ps -eo pid,ppid,cmd,%mem --sort=-%mem | head"}
5: {"invocation": "List all running processes owned by a specific user.\n", "cmd": "ps -u USERNAME"}
